thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother’s Kim Woodburn in talks for own telly show after explosive clash with This Morning host Phillip Schofield
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother’s Kim Woodburn in talks for own telly show after explosive clash with This Morning host Phillip Schofield

author: spacker
title: Celebrity Big Brother’s Kim Woodburn in talks for own telly show after explosive clash with This Morning host Phillip Schofield
text:
TV Magazine JUDGE WOODBURN Celebrity Big Brother’s Kim Woodburn in talks for own telly show after explosive clash with This Morning host Phillip Schofield 
A number of TV channels are keen to sign up Kim following her time in the house Exclusive By STUART PINK, Bizarre Deputy Editor 7th February 2017, 1:14 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments KIM Woodburn is in talks with telly bosses about fronting a confrontational Judge Rinder style show after her bust up with Phillip Schofield. 
The loudmouth How Clean is Your House? star has also discussed the idea of her own reality or chat programme as TV chiefs look to exploit her notoriety post-Celebrity Big Brother. Kim Woodburn is in talks with telly bosses about fronting a confrontational Judge Rinder style show 
A source said: “Bosses are really excited by the prospect of signing Kim up for something long-term. 
“She would be the perfect host of her own chat show as she’s not afraid to say exactly what she thinks. Related Links QUEEN OF CLEAN All you need to know about Kim Woodburn - Celebrity Big Brother 2017 finalist and How Clean Is Your House star IT'S ME OR HER Rufus Hound quit Celebrity Juice over explosive row with Celebrity Big Brother's Kim Woodburn The thigh's the limit Nicola McLean shows off her endless legs in thigh high boots and a ripped jumper - but hits a snag as it gets caught in her car keys BABE-WATCH Jessica Cunningham swaps CBB for Baywatch as she hits the beach in raunchy red swimsuit 'IT'S LIKE GOGGLEBOX' Kim Woodburn's epic row with This Morning host Phillip Schofield prompts flood of memes FIFTY SHADES OF PHIL Holly Willoughby erupts into laughter as Phillip Schofield makes BDSM joke about his wife 
“Kim reckons her TV days are over but she’s had multiple offers following her appearance on CBB. 
“A number of channels are interested and she’s having talks this week.” 
The telly star, who had a number of high-profile fights on CBB, even had a row with Philip on Monday during her appearance on This Morning. Kim Woodburn kicks off on This Morning when Phil suggests she caused the rows on CBB Ruckas The loudmouth star has also discussed the idea of her own reality or chat programme Getty Images - WireImage 6 The 74-year-old is in talks this week as a number of TV channels are interested in signing her up 
She was unimpressed with Phil who grilled her over her fights with Chloe Ferry, Nicola McLean and Jamie O’Hara. 
The 74-year-old claimed Nicola was the cause of all her rows and labelled the model a “bully” before arguing back at Philip for his views. 
She said: “I never look for trouble, you bring it to me I’ll crucify you. 
“Why should I have to be bossed around by her? I think it is very important to have manners but with those pigs in there, you couldn’t. Sorry Phil but you weren’t there.” 
Phil admitted live on the telly show: “You’re already making me feel confrontational” before asking Kim if Coleen was a worthy winner. Kim Woodburn reveals all on her rows with Nicola McLean on Celebrity Big Brother Fame Flynet
